scripts.build: npm run build:bin & npm run build:cjs & npm run build:esm & npm run build:plugin & wait
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:package && npm run clean:log && npm run clean:output && npm run clean:per-file
scripts.clean:package: (cd packages/typique && rm -rf bin && rm -rf cjs && rm -rf esm && rm -rf ts-plugin)
scripts.test: npm run test:util && npm run test:plugin:unit && npm run test:server:unit && npm run test:server && npm run test:bin
scripts.test:server: npm run test:server:old && npm run test:server:new
